other_tests.findings: Sinus bradycardia and nonspecific T-wave changes
other_tests.changes_over_time: Bradycardia and orthostatic hypotension slowly improved

other_tests.findings: Normal pituitary gland; prominence of the ventricles and sulci, suggesting diffuse loss of cerebral volume
Z-scores below -1 at the lumbar spine and hip, indicating low bone density
other_tests.changes_over_time: Declining bone-density measures over the preceding 2.5 years

other_tests.findings: Abundant stool throughout the colon and small bowel, suggestive of fecal impaction
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normal radiograph obtained 3 days later after disimpaction

other_tests.findings: Bone age of 15 years 6 months, indicating delayed skeletal maturation
